y.view
Class ShapeDrawable

java.lang.Object
  y.view.ShapeDrawable
All Implemented Interfaces:
Drawable
public class ShapeDrawable
extends Object
implements Drawable

A convenience class that makes it easy to specify a Drawable using any Shape instance.
